author: swanfinance
title: Earn Interest on CeFi and DeFi
description: Most crypto users use centralized exchanges, but it takes more knowledge and initiative to use decentralized platforms (only $91 billion).
solution: Users will be able to use their crypto deposits on the CeFi platform to earn additional interest through Plutus smart contracts on DeFi.
experience: John Ro served on 2 blockchain startups: Relex and Paysic. The developers from Wiringbits who participated in Prism for IOHK are helping us.
